å…³é”®è¯ï¼šå›¾åƒå¤„ç†ï¼ŒæŠ å›¾æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œé€šé“æŠ å›¾ï¼ŒPhotoshop

abstract

With the development of computer network technology and network technology, great changes have taken place in peopleâ€™s lives. A large number of data are filled with peopleâ€™s lives, and pictures are the most intuitive medium to transmit information. With the improvement of peopleâ€™s appreciation level, peopleâ€™s demand for images is also increasing, so the demand for talents in this field is also increasing. At present, some secondary vocational schools in our country have realized the function of PS image processing software and set up separate courses to teach students how to use PS software. PS itself has strong practicability. Teachers should not only teach students the knowledge of image processing, but also guide students to master the operating skills of PS software and stimulate their image creation ability. With the popularity of photo editing, many non-professionals also have a strong demand for learning Photoshop matting technology. Therefore, it is necessary to master the basic matting method. Matting occupies a large proportion in image processing, [1] matting process is needed in both image post-processing and image design, which is more common in Photoshop software. matting requires high comprehensive ability of technicians, and requires a lot of actual combat experience to complete more complex image extraction. therefore, it is very necessary to master basic matting methods.

Keywords: image processing, matting method, channel matting, Photoshop
